Description: The Warehouse Administrator is responsible to deliver safe , efficient and prompt daily outbound shipments in Warehouse and ensuring excellent customer service to external and internal customers . Initiate and take a part in warehouse improvement project with the warehouse team.Key Results/Accountabilities expected from the role:1 ) Review daily Shipping log ( IDCS )2 ) Follow Up Packaging confirmation from Warehouse Team3 ) Follow Up Collection schedule with Customer4 ) Create / Co ordinate Shipping documents5 ) Shipment info & Invoice documentation ( IDCS )6 ) BO followup & Update with CustomerResult Measured :1) Outbound Service level2 ) Shipping documentation accuracy3 ) Customer satisfaction score ( CSAT )Skills
Skills:
3+ Years Of Customer Sevice and shipping or Logistics Experience
Bachelor Degree or High school Diploma
Proficient with MS Office
Excellent Communication & Organization Skill
Customer Oriented
Ability to Work under Pressure
This position will be based in Dubai, travelling if needed.
